sentences.en: After a long hesitation, he told the truth at last.
sentences.cn: 踌躇了半天, 他终于直说了.

sentences.en: After a moment's hesitation Feng Yun - ching handed over a hundred dollars.
sentences.cn: 略一迟疑以后,冯云卿就给了一百块.

sentences.en: After some hesitation one of them began to speak.
sentences.cn: 犹豫了一会儿之后，他们中有一个人开口了。

sentences.en: Asked if he would go back, Mr Searle said after some hesitation, "I'll have to think about that"
sentences.cn: 当被问到是否会回去时，瑟尔先生迟疑了一下说：“我得考虑考虑。”
布赖恩的犹豫几乎难以察觉。

sentences.en: He agreed to do it without hesitation.
sentences.cn: 这件事他一口应承下来了.

sentences.en: I had no hesitation in calling the police because I realised he was capable of murder.
sentences.cn: 我意识到他可能要杀人，所以就毫不犹豫地报了警。

sentences.en: Mirella approached him and, after a brief hesitation, shook his hand.
sentences.cn: 米雷拉走近他，犹豫片刻后，和他握了握手。

sentences.en: Referee Michael Reed had no hesitation in awarding a penalty.
sentences.cn: 裁判迈克尔·里德毫不犹豫地判了点球。

sentences.en: She agreed without the slightest hesitation.
The board said it had no hesitation in unanimously rejecting the offer.
sentences.cn: 董事会自称毫不犹豫地一致否决了该项报价。
男孩毫不犹豫地跟了上去。

sentences.en: The great majority of players would, of course, sign the contract without hesitation.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数球员当然会毫不犹豫地签合同。

sentences.en: There was a certain hesitation in her manner.
sentences.cn: 她的态度有些犹豫不决.

sentences.en: With some hesitation and an uncertain smile, she held out her hand.
sentences.cn: 她犹豫了一下，带着迟疑的微笑把手伸了出去。

words.tran_cn: 迟疑的；踌躇的；犹豫不定的
踌躇，犹豫；有疑虑，不愿意
